summary: An eager Thanksgiving parade coordinator is shocked when a wealthy consultant is hired to analyze its finances. Faced with teaching him that the parade means so much more to her than money, she finds herself reluctantly falling for him.
cast: Autumn Reeser|Antonio Cupo|April Telek|Ben Cotton|Ali Liebert|Alvin Sanders|Richard Ian Cox|Barbara Kottmeier|David Hovan|Fulvio Cecere|Denalda Williams|Callum Seagram Airlie|Jay Brazeau
title: Love at the Thanksgiving Day Parade
